title: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG)
description: PUBG is a competitive battle royale shooter where players fight to be the last one standing on dynamic maps.

title: Fortnite
description: Fortnite combines building, shooting, and creativity in an ever-evolving battle royale experience.

title: Call of Duty: Warzone
description: Warzone is a large-scale battle royale mode featuring iconic Call of Duty gunplay and intense combat.

title: Apex Legends
description: Apex Legends is a fast-paced hero shooter set in the Titanfall universe with team-based tactical gameplay.

title: Valorant
description: Valorant is a tactical 5v5 hero shooter that mixes gunplay precision with unique agent abilities.

title: Counter-Strike 2
description: Counter-Strike 2 is the evolution of the classic tactical shooter, built on the Source 2 engine.

title: Overwatch 2
description: Overwatch 2 is a team-based shooter featuring dynamic heroes, fast-paced objectives, and colorful visuals.

title: Minecraft
description: Minecraft is a block-based open-world game about creativity, exploration, and survival.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: GTA V is an open-world action game featuring crime, chaos, and storytelling across Los Santos.

title: League of Legends
description: League of Legends is a competitive 5v5 MOBA where champions battle to destroy the enemy Nexus.

title: Dota 2
description: Dota 2 is a complex and strategic MOBA where two teams of heroes compete to destroy the Ancient.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: The Witcher 3 is a story-driven RPG set in a beautifully dark fantasy world full of monsters and magic.

title: Elden Ring
description: Elden Ring is an open-world action RPG that combines deep lore and brutal combat by FromSoftware.

title: Genshin Impact
description: Genshin Impact is an open-world adventure RPG with elemental combat and anime-style storytelling.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is a futuristic open-world RPG set in the neon-lit city of Night City.
